com.verisign.epp.framework
Class EPPEvent

java.lang.Object
  com.verisign.epp.framework.EPPEvent

public class EPPEvent
extends java.lang.Object

The EPPEvent class contains an EPPMessage for EPPEventHandlers to respond to.
